title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\Rule\OnewaySynonymsAction
name: OnewaySynonymsAction
description:
Maps a set of terms to a set of synonyms.

Set of synonyms will be treated as synonyms of each query term only. query_terms will not be treated as synonyms of each other. Example: "sneakers" will use a synonym of "shoes". "shoes" will not use a synonym of "sneakers".

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.Rule.OnewaySynonymsAction

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.query_terms
params.description: Terms from the search query. Will treat synonyms as their synonyms. Not themselves synonyms of the synonyms. Can specify up to 100 terms.

params.name: data.synonyms
params.description: Defines a set of synonyms. Cannot contain duplicates. Can specify up to 100 synonyms.
